modeltools R package

Tools for building COVID-19 statistical models, with an emphasis on short-term forecasting and hotspot prediction. This package is meant to be used in conjuction with the covidcast and evalcast packages developed by the Delphi research group headquartered at Carnegie Mellon University.

./modeltools_sidebar.html

Developed by Ryan Tibshirani.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
